mainText:
I felt doubts about leaving PC utilities 
and jump into Mac.
Your speech at Stanford University was definitive, even it is not 
related with hardware or software decision, it was the reason why I join Apple 
world.

I'm feeling so sad to see you leaving. I want to believe that I knew you 
through Apple products. My condolences to your family and all the people that loves you.
author: Cristian
